truths: Grab the blue square block B1 and move it towards the top left.
Move to bottom and pick up block B1 and move to top left with block B1
Grab B1 and move it two thirds of the way to the top left corner
Move block B1 to the top-left of the arena.
cot:
The ground truth goals all specify that block B1 should be moved towards the top left or to the top-left of the arena. The predicted goal only states "Pick up B1" without any information about where to move B1 after picking it up.

Since the predicted goal lacks the information about the final location of B1, it is incomplete compared to the ground truth goals. The action of picking up B1 is a part of the ground truth goals, but it is not sufficient on its own to achieve the full goal described in the ground truths.

Therefore, the similarity level is:

(1) Incorrect: An agent that tries to achieve the predicted goal will fail in achieving the real goal because there is a meaningful difference between the two goals. The predicted goal omits the crucial step of moving B1 to the top left, which is necessary for the goal to be completed.
